title: Oleh Haras
text:
Oleh Haras (; born 5 December 1976) is a <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> in 1992 for <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">FC Karpaty Lviv</a>.
Coaching career.
In February 2012 he was returned to football as playing assistant coach for <a href="FC%20Lviv">FC Lviv</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a>.
